name: LINE-JBot
description: A simple LINE bot using Node.js

PREFIX.description: symbol to initiate the bot command. if leaved blank it will use point(.) as the prefix

CHANNEL_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: LINE channel access token for the bot (read LINE API documentation for more info)

CHANNEL_SECRET.description: LINE Channel secret code for the bot (read LINE API documentation for more info)

SNOWFLAKE_STUDIO_API_KEY.description: snowflake studio API key for AI chatbot feature (Deprecated/not working anymore). you can leave this option or use your own key

SEARCH_ENGINE.descrption: image search engine to use ( google / yandex)

CSE_ID.description: required if the image search engine is google custom search engine. the CSE(custom search engine) ID for image search, you can leave it or use your own CSE

G_API_KEY.description: required if the image search engine is google custom search engine. google API Key to trigger the CSE API, you can leave it or use your own API key but the limitation is 100 shared requests per day
